title: Ciężków
text:
Ciężków is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Aleksandr%C3%B3w%20%C5%81%C3%B3dzki">Gmina Aleksandrów Łódzki</a>, within <a href="Zgierz%20County">Zgierz County</a>, <a href="%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA%20Voivodeship">Łódź Voivodeship</a>, in central <a href="Poland">Poland</a>. It lies approximately west of <a href="Aleksandr%C3%B3w%20%C5%81%C3%B3dzki">Aleksandrów Łódzki</a>, west of <a href="Zgierz">Zgierz</a>, and west of the regional capital <a href="%C5%81%C3%B3d%C5%BA">Łódź</a>.
In 2005 the village had a population of 120.
References.
